feature.label: Ice Builder for Eclipse
feature.description: The Ice Builder plug-in manages the translation of Slice to Java. The plug-in computes dependencies between Slice files and automatically recompiles Slice files when necessary. The plug-in also manages the generated code to eliminate obsolete files.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) ZeroC, Inc. All rights reserved This copy of the Ice Builder for Eclipse is licensed to you under the terms described in the license agreement attached to this distribution.
